intro: Your Journey Begins Beneath the Sands of Time
description:
Step into a thrilling excavation adventure set beneath the ancient sands of Egypt, where history, discovery, and progression come together in one immersive experience. In this dinosaur excavation simulator, you lead your own archaeological expedition - carefully digging through layered desert terrain, uncovering fossil remains, and revealing secrets lost for millions of years.

Begin with simple excavation tools and gradually upgrade your equipment to handle deeper, more delicate digs. Improve your brushes, shovels, and drilling tools, unlock advanced scanning devices, and refine your excavation techniques to locate fossils with greater precision and efficiency.

Explore vast underground sites hidden beneath the Egyptian desert, filled with dinosaur bones, ancient skeletons, rare fossils, and mysterious prehistoric remains waiting to be unearthed. Catalog your discoveries, restore valuable specimens, sell or exhibit rare finds, and reinvest your resources to unlock new excavation zones and deeper layers of history.

No timers, no pressure - just pure discovery and scientific exploration. Dig carefully, plan your excavations wisely, and become a master paleontologist. The deeper you dig, the more extraordinary and ancient your discoveries become. How much of Earth’s forgotten past will you uncover?
